cab.content: Military Secret.us Dochp. Ptroporty of Government.w ^8171yyVfom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,^Jir--^^ (Received 17th.)12661. 16th September. Continuation of my 10447, 2nd August. Report received that Bravin, accompanied by IS foreigners, arrived at Kabul, and was received by Amir on 4th September. Britforce and Malmiss have been informed.
